abstracted_objective: Start a sequential code flow, with multiple subtasks performed in turn
Analyze the input to identify, isolate, and characterize its essential components, attributes, and relationships that define its structure and function.
Evaluate the input entities against specified criteria or conditions to identify, characterize, compare, or rank their properties, behaviors, or roles.
Derive a target output by applying defined operations, transformations, or mappings to given inputs under specified conditions or criteria.

Identify and select one or more candidates from a set of options that simultaneously satisfy multiple specified criteria or conditions through comparative evaluation, and select element(s) that conform to or deviate from specified criteria based on evaluation.
